alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 24 at 12:35AM PST until November 25 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. * WHERE...Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco, and Lake San Antonio and Mountains of San Benito and Interior Monterey County including Pinnacles National Park. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 4 AM to 10 AM PST this morning. For the Freeze Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio
